topic.question: 1. The student went to the right room. Which room did he go to?
2. Peter and I had been conversing since 10 o'clock. What have we been doing?
3. Where do you take the dirty clothes?
4. Jack spilt the soda water. What was spilt?
5. You should select the right answer for each question. What should you do?
6. I asked for his opinion. What did I want?
7. Mary asked Joe if he had a nice trip. Joe answered, "Yes."
option: He is going on a trip.

topic.question: 8. This hat fits me all right. I will take it.
9. Every six months, Mr. Brown takes his car to the mechanic for an inspection.
option: Mr. Brown wrecks his car every 6 months.
Mr. Brown trades his car every 6 months.
The mechanic examines Mr. Brown's car every 6 months.
The mechanic repairs Mr. Brown's car every 6 months.

topic.question: 10. Billy has football practice every afternoon at four o'clock. When does he have football practice?
11. What is the capacity of this water tank?
12. He hears a strange noise. What kind of noise does he hear?
13. Each of the boys has a separate room. What does each boy have?
14. Mr. Jones made a major change in the regulation. What kind of change was it?
15. Mrs. King has a serious ailment. What does she have?
16. Pilots must read their instruments accurately. How must they read them?
17. Mr. Grayson told us to watch out. What did he tell us to do?
18. John said, "It's nine am and I'm leaving right away." When is he leaving?
19. Watkins forgot my telephone number.
20. There's something the matter with the engine.
option: The car doesn't make any noise.
The engine was removed from the car.
The car is not running well.

topic.question: 21. The room was quiet.
option: It had many people in it.

topic.question: 22. John kept watching the people swim.
option: He went swimming with the people.
He continued to look at the swimmers.

topic.question: 23. The cat doesn't like to take a bath.
24. Joe said, "This is a difficult course. But I believe I can make it."
option: He doesn't think he will succeed.
He's not going to take the course.

topic.question: 25. Our team was composed of three people.
option: Our team saw the three people.
Our team talked to the three people.
The three people defeated our team.
The three people made up our team.

topic.question: 26. Headquarters is next to the lab building.
option: It is across from the lab building.
It is beside the lab building.
It is under the lab building.
It is above the lab building.

topic.question: 27. They kept their people in mind.
28. The cashier gave me some change. What did he give me?
29. Mr. Long liked the cartoons in the evening newspaper. What were they?
30. The clock is attached to the wall. Where is the clock?

31. We were on a tour when the accident happened. What were we doing when the accident
happened?
32. Joe quit working after sunset. When did Joe stop?
33. Tom asked the clerk, "How much are the eggs?" What should the clerk say?
option: There are twelve in a carton.

topic.question: 34. The people are moving up so that they can see the game better. Where are they going?
35. Thomas Edison was considered to be a genius. What does this mean?
36. I have a pain in my right arm.
option: My arm has paint on it.
I have dirt on my right arm.
I have no feeling in my arm.

topic.question: 37. The mail clerk said he was sorry he didn't have a letter for me.
option: The mail clerk had a letter for me.
The mail clerk said I was sorry.
There was no mail for me.

topic.question: 38. The children cooked their own supper tonight. I didn't help them.
option: Supper was prepared by my wife.
My wife and I prepared the supper.
The children can't cook at all.
The children did all the work.

topic.question: 39.  In a bank, one must be able to identify oneself.
option: One must prove who one is.
One must show that one has money.
One must show the writer of the check.

topic.question: 40. What is the function of this switch?
option: It's only a very small part.
It's used only once a day.
It's used to turn on the motor.

topic.question: 41. John said that his car is in good shape.
option: The owner of the car is good.

topic.question: 42. Occasionally, Joe becomes irritated with his friends.
option: He becomes annoyed with his friends.
He gets too involved with his friends.

topic.question: 43. Henry, please take charge of the class.
44. I am running short of cash at present.
option: I have more money than usual.
I have a lot of cash at present

topic.question: 45. Did you intend to do that?
option: Yes, it was a lucky accident.
Yes, I found out about it later.
Yes, it was a surprise to me.

topic.question: 46. What is a bulb used for?
47. The humidity is high this afternoon. What is the weather like?
48. The hotel manager said that Jim would operate the elevator today. What will Jim do?
49. Did you help her make up her mind?
option: Yes, I minded about the maid.
Yes, I looked for a new sign.

topic.question: 50. We'll have to tear down the engine. What will we have to do?
51. This is a harmless animal.
52. Although this saw is new, it's dull.
53. Tom coiled the wire before he put it away.
54. He said he would pick me up in his truck.
option: He said he would get a used truck.
He told me he would call for me in his truck.
He told me he would sell his truck.
He said I should call him up.

topic.question: 55. Every night the wind dies down. What happens when the wind dies down?
56. Yesterday it drizzled all day.

57. W: I hear that Lt. Winters is joining you.
M: Yes. What kind of person do you think he is?
Q: What does the man want to know about Lt Winters?
option: when he is expected to arrive

topic.question:
58.  W: What did you tell them?
M: That the situation is critical.
Q: What does the man mean?
option: There is nothing to talk about.

topic.question:
59. W: Why can't you let me in?
M: I forgot the key.
Q: Why can't the man and woman go in?

60. W: What does Billy want?
M: A blanket.
Q: Why does Bill want a blanket?

61. W: Can your brother lift that heavy weight?
M: Yes, he is the school champion in weight lifting.
Q: How would you describe the man's brother?

62. W: The club had a meeting last night.
M: I know. I was present.
Q: What did the man mean?
option: He was the leader of the club.
He received a gift at the meeting.

topic.question:
63. M: What are you waiting for?
W: For you to apologize.
Q: What does she expect the man to do?

64. M: What is the matter?
W: The man tried to grab my purse.
Q: What was happened?
option: Someone tried to rob the woman.

topic.question:
65. W: Do you want some help?
M: Yes. Would you please catalog these books so we can find what we want?
Q: What did the man ask the woman to do?
option: Put the books in a neat pile.
List the books in some orderly way.
Write the titles of the books on their covers.
Put the books on a shelf according to size.

topic.question:
66. M: What's Peter's house like?
W: It's huge.
Q: What did she say about his house?
